title: Making the Best of the Worst: Things to Do, Positive Mindset & How we are Feeling
itunes:title: Making the Best of the Worst: Things to Do, Positive Mindset & How we are Feeling
description:
Brooke and Danielle talk about COVID-19 and how its affecting them and those around them. Also, tips on how to stay positive in these uncertain times. 

NEW MERCH HERE: https://shop.podcastone.com/collections/gals-on-the-go 

Please check out our channels on YouTube!

Brooke Miccio 

Danielle Carolan
